item.title: Gentrification
item.description: https://www.reddit.com/r/nyc/comments/6gsj53/brokers_who_market_harlem_as_soha_could_be_fined/ stoopidemuInwood 5 points 1 month ago Yeah this law is some pandering BS and addresses nothing. It won’t stop or even slow down gentrification. It will just be a waste of taxpayer money as it is struck down as a 1st amendment violation. Brokers suck. But they aren’t the problem. Landlords, stupid zoning laws, and mega tall buildings designed to be tax shelters are the problem. http://grist.org/cities/american-cities-have-bigger-things-to-worry-about-than-gentrification/ “data by Census tract from 1970 to 2010 shows that concentrated urban poverty has grown worse.
